title: Ocean Boulevard
creator_credit: Film Australia, Sonia Humphrey and Rachael Ryan
brief_description: This drama follows a group of young people as they meet and interact. The group consists of two young army privates, two single girls and a girl already in a relationship. Through their interaction the film looks at issues such as self-worth, self-esteem, personal values, sexual identity and the way relationships are viewed.
